mapper.sql: ID, NAME, CREDIT_CODE, ENTERPRISE_CREATE_DATE, TYPE, REGISTERED_ADDRESS, REGISTERED_CAPITAL, REGISTRATION_AUTHORITY, LOCATION, IDENTIFICATION_SITUATION, INDUSTRY_TYPE, MAIN_PRODUCTS, WHETHER_LISTED, LISTED_TYPE, STOCK_CODE, LISTED_DATE, LEGAL_NAME, CAR_TYPE, CAR_NUMBER, LEGAL_TELEPHONE, LEGAL_PHONE, LEGAL_EMAIL, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_PHONE, CONTACT_EMAIL, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE

a.ID AS id, a.NAME AS name, a.CREDIT_CODE AS creditCode, a.ENTERPRISE_CREATE_DATE AS enterpriseCreateDate, a.TYPE AS type, a.REGISTERED_ADDRESS AS registeredAddress, a.REGISTERED_CAPITAL AS registeredCapital, a.REGISTRATION_AUTHORITY AS registrationAuthority, a.LOCATION AS location, a.IDENTIFICATION_SITUATION AS identificationSituation, a.INDUSTRY_TYPE AS industryType, a.MAIN_PRODUCTS AS mainProducts, a.WHETHER_LISTED AS whetherListed, a.LISTED_TYPE AS listedType, a.STOCK_CODE AS stockCode, a.LISTED_DATE AS listedDate, a.LEGAL_NAME AS legalName, a.CAR_TYPE AS carType, a.CAR_NUMBER AS carNumber, a.LEGAL_TELEPHONE AS legalTelephone, a.LEGAL_PHONE AS legalPhone, a.LEGAL_EMAIL AS legalEmail, a.CONTACT_NAME AS contactName, a.CONTACT_PHONE AS contactPhone, a.CONTACT_EMAIL AS contactEmail, a.CREATE_DATE AS createDate, a.UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate, finance.ID AS enterpriseFinance.id, finance.ENTERPRISE_ID AS enterpriseFinance.enterpriseId, finance.OPERATING_INCOME AS enterpriseFinance.operatingIncome, finance.MAIN_BUSINESS_INCOME AS enterpriseFinance.mainBusinessIncome, finance.OPERATING_COST AS enterpriseFinance.operatingCost, finance.TOTAL_TAX AS enterpriseFinance.totalTax, finance.TOTAL_PROFIT AS enterpriseFinance.totalProfit, finance.TOTAL_ASSETS AS enterpriseFinance.totalAssets, finance.TOTAL_FIXED_ASSETS AS enterpriseFinance.totalFixedAssets, finance.TOTAL_LIABILITIES AS enterpriseFinance.totalLiabilities, finance.RESEARCH_COST AS enterpriseFinance.researchCost, finance.GOVERNMENT_FUNDING AS enterpriseFinance.governmentFunding, finance.PROPORTION AS enterpriseFinance.proportion, finance.CREATE_DATE AS enterpriseFinance.createDate, finance.UPDATE_DATE AS enterpriseFinance.update_date, person.ID AS enterprisePerson.id, person.ENTERPRISE_ID AS enterprisePerson.enterpriseId, person.TOTAL_STAFF AS enterprisePerson.totalStaff, person.TECHNOLOGY_PERSON AS enterprisePerson.technologyPerson, person.PROPORTION AS enterprisePerson.proportion, person.IN_SERVICE AS enterprisePerson.inService, person.PART_TIME AS enterprisePerson.partTime, person.TEMPORARY AS enterprisePerson.temporary, person.DOCTOR AS enterprisePerson.doctor, person.MASTER_DEGREE AS enterprisePerson.masterDegree, person.BACHELOR AS enterprisePerson.bachelor, person.COLLEGE_AND_BELOW AS enterprisePerson.collegeAndBelow, person.SENIOR_TITLE AS enterprisePerson.seniorTitle, person.INTERMEDIATE_TITLE AS enterprisePerson.intermediateTitle, person.PRIMARY_TITLE AS enterprisePerson.primaryTitle, person.CREATE_DATE AS enterprisePerson.createDate, person.UPDATE_DATE AS enterprisePerson.updateDate, property.ID AS enterpriseIntellectualProperty.id, property.ENTERPRISE_ID AS enterpriseIntellectualProperty.enterpriseId, property.PATENT AS enterpriseIntellectualProperty.patent, property.UTILITY_MODEL_PATENTS AS enterpriseIntellectualProperty.utilityModelPatents, property.DESIGN_PATENT AS enterpriseIntellectualProperty.designPatent, property.SOFTWARE_COPYRIGHT AS enterpriseIntellectualProperty.softwareCpyright, property.NATIONAL_NEW_DRUG AS enterpriseIntellectualProperty.nationalNewDrug, property.MEDICINE AS enterpriseIntellectualProperty.medicine, property.NEW_PLANT_VARIETY AS enterpriseIntellectualProperty.newPlantVariety, property.CROP_VARIETY AS enterpriseIntellectualProperty.cropVariety, property.INTEGRATED_CIRCUIT AS enterpriseIntellectualProperty.integratedCircuit, property.CREATE_DATE AS enterpriseIntellectualProperty.createDate, property.UPDATE_DATE AS enterpriseIntellectualProperty.updateDate, pdf.ID AS enterpriseFilePdf.id, pdf.ENTERPRISE_ID AS enterpriseFilePdf.enterpriseId, pdf.BUSINESS_LICENSE_COPY AS enterpriseFilePdf.businessLicenseCopy, pdf.INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY AS enterpriseFilePdf.intellectualProperty, pdf.FINANCIAL_AUDIT_REPORT AS enterpriseFilePdf.financialAuditReport, pdf.INSTRUCTION_MANUAL AS enterpriseFilePdf.instructionManual, pdf.CREATE_DATE AS enterpriseFilePdf.createDate, pdf.UPDATE_DATE AS enterpriseFilePdf.updateDate

a.ID AS id, a.NAME AS name, a.CREDIT_CODE AS creditCode, a.ENTERPRISE_CREATE_DATE AS enterpriseCreateDate, a.TYPE AS type, a.REGISTERED_ADDRESS AS registeredAddress, a.REGISTERED_CAPITAL AS registeredCapital, a.REGISTRATION_AUTHORITY AS registrationAuthority, a.LOCATION AS location, a.IDENTIFICATION_SITUATION AS identificationSituation, a.INDUSTRY_TYPE AS industryType, a.MAIN_PRODUCTS AS mainProducts, a.WHETHER_LISTED AS whetherListed, a.LISTED_TYPE AS listedType, a.STOCK_CODE AS stockCode, a.LISTED_DATE AS listedDate, a.LEGAL_NAME AS legalName, a.CAR_TYPE AS carType, a.CAR_NUMBER AS carNumber, a.LEGAL_TELEPHONE AS legalTelephone, a.LEGAL_PHONE AS legalPhone, a.LEGAL_EMAIL AS legalEmail, a.CONTACT_NAME AS contactName, a.CONTACT_PHONE AS contactPhone, a.CONTACT_EMAIL AS contactEmail, a.CREATE_DATE AS createDate, a.UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate, a.FINANCE_ID AS financeId, a.PERSON_ID AS personId, a.PROPERTY_ID AS propertyId, a.PDF_ID AS pdfId
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM enterprise_info a JOIN enterprise_finance finance ON finance.enterprise_id = a.id JOIN enterprise_person person ON person.enterprise_id = a.id JOIN enterprise_intellectual_property property ON property.enterprise_id = a.id JOIN enterprise_file_pdf pdf ON pdf.enterprise_id = a.id

SELECT
FROM enterprise_info a WHERE a.ID = #{value}

SELECT
FROM enterprise_info a JOIN enterprise_finance finance ON finance.enterprise_id = a.id JOIN enterprise_person person ON person.enterprise_id = a.id JOIN enterprise_intellectual_property property ON property.enterprise_id = a.id JOIN enterprise_file_pdf pdf ON pdf.enterprise_id = a.id WHERE a.ID = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO enterprise_info ( ID, NAME, CREDIT_CODE, ENTERPRISE_CREATE_DATE, TYPE, REGISTERED_ADDRESS, REGISTERED_CAPITAL, REGISTRATION_AUTHORITY, LOCATION, IDENTIFICATION_SITUATION, INDUSTRY_TYPE, MAIN_PRODUCTS, WHETHER_LISTED, LISTED_TYPE, STOCK_CODE, LISTED_DATE, LEGAL_NAME, CAR_TYPE, CAR_NUMBER, LEGAL_TELEPHONE, LEGAL_PHONE, LEGAL_EMAIL, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_PHONE, CONTACT_EMAIL, FINANCE_ID, PERSON_ID, PROPERTY_ID, PDF_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{creditCode}, #{enterpriseCreateDate}, #{type}, #{registeredAddress}, #{registeredCapital}, #{registrationAuthority}, #{location}, #{identificationSituation}, #{industryType}, #{mainProducts}, #{whetherListed}, #{listedType}, #{stockCode}, #{listedDate}, #{legalName}, #{carType}, #{carNumber}, #{legalTelephone}, #{legalPhone}, #{legalEmail}, #{contactName}, #{contactPhone}, #{contactEmail}, #{financeId}, #{personId}, #{propertyId}, #{pdfId}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE enterprise_info SET
NAME = #{name},
CREDIT_CODE = #{creditCode},
ENTERPRISE_CREATE_DATE = #{enterpriseCreateDate},
TYPE = #{type},
REGISTERED_ADDRESS = #{registeredAddress},
REGISTERED_CAPITAL = #{registeredCapital},
REGISTRATION_AUTHORITY = #{registrationAuthority},
LOCATION = #{location},
IDENTIFICATION_SITUATION = #{identificationSituation},
INDUSTRY_TYPE = #{industryType},
MAIN_PRODUCTS = #{mainProducts},
WHETHER_LISTED = #{whetherListed},
LISTED_TYPE = #{listedType},
STOCK_CODE = #{stockCode},
LISTED_DATE = #{listedDate},
LEGAL_NAME = #{legalName},
CAR_TYPE = #{carType},
CAR_NUMBER = #{carNumber},
LEGAL_TELEPHONE = #{legalTelephone},
LEGAL_PHONE = #{legalPhone},
LEGAL_EMAIL = #{legalEmail},
CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName},
CONTACT_PHONE = #{contactPhone},
CONTACT_EMAIL = #{contactEmail},
FINANCE_ID = #{financeId}
PERSON_ID = #{personId}
PROPERTY_ID = #{propertyId}
PDF_ID = #{pdfId}
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
